Life Stages?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Life Stages?
By Anonymous on Monday, April 8, 2002 - 11:29 am:

I just bought MR1 and don't have a clue about the life stages. How do I know when my monster is in his prime?

By Lisa Shock on Monday, April 8, 2002 - 11:52 am:

Watch the size of the monster carefully at feeding time, and note the growth spurts. Prime usually happens a few months before you hear one of the two mid-life warnings: "most important stage" or "whether or not he becomes a good fighter".

By Anonymous on Monday, April 8, 2002 - 12:34 pm:

By ArmageddonGeddon on Monday, July 22, 2002 - 11:33 pm:

By Urashima Taro on Saturday, March 12, 2005 - 11:16 am:

I noticed that (at least with my scetch) in mid-life their stat gain seems too be the best. when they get older it reduces a little but not quite as low as in the baby stage of their life. this site is the best I have found and I am very proud to be a part of such a magnifisent opperation (spelling off a little gomen)
